scripts.compile: npm run compile -w packages/api && npm run compile -w packages/util && npm run compile -w extensions/vscode-fabric
scripts.package: npm run package -w packages/api && npm run package -w packages/util && npm run package -w extensions/vscode-fabric
scripts.compile-tests: concurrently "npm run compile-tests -w extensions/vscode-fabric" "npm run compile-tests -w packages/api" "npm run compile-tests -w packages/util"
scripts.test: npm run test -w packages/api && npm run test -w packages/util && npm run test -w extensions/vscode-fabric
